channel.title: Compile
channel.description:
Okay i have all java needed and jdk 5.0 update 9 and jre 5.0 update 9 and this code in my compile
[code]@echo off COLOR 08 title Xscape Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java" server pause[/code]
and i get 70 errors when noby else taht uses my sourec gets. s i know it has to do with my java

item.title: Compile
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

For Jdk1.5.0_09 and Jre1.5.0_05 put this:

@echo off COLOR 08 title Xscape Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\java" server pause

Post back to see if it worksâ€¦
